chapter.title: Post Installation Configuration
chapter.para: Now that you have installed &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; to suit your needs, you can go ahead and configure the Stack to meet your requirements. The User Guide (available along with this Installation Guide) in the restcomm-ss7-<version>/ss7/docs folder will assist you in configuring and managing the Stack. The Shell Management module will enable you to easily configure the Stack using the Command Line Interface (CLI) tool.
chapter.section:
Memory Settings We recommend that you fine-tune the JVM memory settings by allocating a minimum of 3 GB for initial and maximum heap size as shown below. However, you may choose any settings that better fits your setup.
-Xms3072m Initial heap size, set in megabytes
-Xmx3072m Maximum heap size, set in megabytes
